title: Multiliteracy PBL Project for Fostering Environmental Literacy and Higher-Order Thinking Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic environmental concepts and digital literacy understanding, experience in simple project execution
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment combining smartphone-based collaboration tools with offline activities

learning_goals: Students can achieve data-driven decision-making skills by analyzing real environmental issue cases.
Learners can demonstrate multiliteracy competencies by creating environmental campaign proposals using diverse media (text/video/infographics).
Through PBL, learners can propose and evaluate actionable environmental conservation plans to address community issues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
